title: Building the Future of Commercial Flooring
subtitle: Who We Are
description: Lynx Flooring is amongst the largest commercial flooring groups nationally and is comprised of some of the strongest contractors in the marketplace. What began as a single acquisition in 2014, has grown into a curated list of companies that are dominant in their markets with long-term track records.
